foreground_usage_description.title: When In Use Usage Description [iOS]
foreground_usage_description.description: This key lets you describe the reason your app accesses the user's location when the app is in the foreground.

background_usage_description.title: Always Usage Description [iOS]
background_usage_description.description: This key lets you describe the reason your app accesses the user's location when the app is in the background.
